Package imagingbook.common.mser.components

Class ComponentTree<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.common.mser.components.ComponentTree<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the data type of components (e.g., MserData)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Component<T>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentTreeGlobalImmersion, ComponentTreeLinearTime
    public abstract class ComponentTree<T>
extends Object
implements Iterable<Component<T>>
    Abstract class representing a tree of extremal image components.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ComponentTree.Method
      Enumeration specifying the method (algorithm) for building the component tree.

        public Collection<Component<T>> getLeaves()
